short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension may replace Chrome's default history to make it easier to view and may quickly open the tabs you just closed.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension may replace Chrome's default history to make it easier to view and may quickly open the tabs you just closed.

Usage:

List: The last 20 history records of yours would have been displayed in a popup list.

Quick Open: The closed tab could be quickly opened in a new tab.

History record: To open the home page of history records.

Clear history records: All history records can be cleared.

We will continue developing new features, fixing bugs, so to provide a better user experience. Please give us your feedback, if you discover problems. Your suggestions are very important to us.

Your history records are stored on your local disk and would not be sent to any server. We will value and protect your privacy.
long.zh_CN,zh_TW:
此扩展取代Chrome默认的历史记录器，能够更轻松地查看历史记录，并能够快速打开刚刚关闭过的tabs。

使用说明：

列表：弹窗列表中展示您最近20条历史记录。

操作栏-快速打开：快速打开刚刚被关闭过的页签，在新页签中打开。

操作栏-历史记录：打开历史记录主页。

操作栏-清空历史记录：可清空所有历史记录。

我们持续开发新功能，以及修复错误，提供更好的使用体验。如果您发现问题请反馈，您的建议对我们非常重要。

您的历史记录存储在本地计算机中，不会发送到任何服务器。我们重视您的隐私权。

This extension may replace Chrome's default history to make it easier to view and may quickly open the tabs you just closed.

Usage:

List: The last 20 history records of yours would have been displayed in a popup list.

Quick Open: The closed tab could be quickly opened in a new tab.

History record: To open the home page of history records.

Clear history records: All history records can be cleared.

We will continue developing new features, fixing bugs, so to provide a better user experience. Please give us your feedback, if you discover problems. Your suggestions are very important to us.

Your history records are stored on your local disk and would not be sent to any server. We will value and protect your privacy.
